::Surgital/Cutthroat/Triggerhappy::

Surgital is hit by the missiles, and s=
tarts wobbling around.
~~~~~~
Cutthroat was hit, then he fell back, but tra=
nsformed to robot mode and fired a missile at Orion.
~~~~~~~
Triggerhappy's=
 body is hit by the missiles, which do absolutely nothing, and Triggerhappy=
's body is just rolled over by the missiles.
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday,=
 October 13, 2001 1:00 PM
  Subject: Re: Attack!


  :::Orion/Sideswipe::: =


  ::Orion was hit by Blowpipe's shots and a few of Perceptor's shots.  As=
 the energy net from Surgital started coming down, Orion looked to Sideswip=
e:: 
  Orion: Watch out! 
  ::He pushes Sideswipe aside and falls to the gr=
ound away from the net.  As Cuttrhoat starts trying to bite at him, Orion l=
aughs:: 
  Orion: Please. 
  ::He fired 1 missle at Cutthroat and 1 at Trig=
gerhappy:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sideswipe gets up from the ground and gives Orion =
thumbs up:: 
  Sideswipe: Thanks buddy! 
  ::He gets hit by Perceptor's sho=
ts. He fired 2 missles at Surgital and 25 rifle shots at Perceptor::
